body:
Comment 1 by **robert.hencke**: 
This works for me at tip with 10.6 and 6g.

sarabi:go-gnuplot roberthencke$ make
cd pkg/gnuplot && /Users/roberthencke/go/bin/gomake install
6g  -o _go_.6 gnuplot.go 
rm -f _obj/bitbucket.org/binet/go-gnuplot/pkg/gnuplot.a
gopack grc _obj/bitbucket.org/binet/go-gnuplot/pkg/gnuplot.a _go_.6 
cp _obj/bitbucket.org/binet/go-gnuplot/pkg/gnuplot.a
"/Users/roberthencke/go/pkg/darwin_amd64/bitbucket.org/binet/go-gnuplot/pkg/gnuplot.a"

Have you tried re-building the Go source tree?
